alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Central Greenville; Greater Oconee; Greater Pickens; Laurens; Northern Spartanburg; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 12:10AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Laurens, Greenville, Spartanburg, northeastern Anderson, central Pickens and east central Oconee Counties through 130 AM EDT... At 1209 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of Pickens to near Easley to 12 miles south of Greenville Downtown. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greenville Downtown, Spartanburg, Easley, Pickens, Greenville Eastside, West Greenville, Greer, Mauldin, Taylors and Simpsonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Anderson; Central Greenville; Greater Oconee; Greater Pickens; Laurens; Northern Spartanburg; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg
